unnormalised: The gig economy presents both opportunities and challenges for HR in India. From managing compliance (PF, ESI) for a distributed workforce like delivery partners in Mumbai to ensuring fair compensation for freelance content writers, there's a lot to consider. We need innovative HR policies that reflect this shift, perhaps incorporating flexible benefits and performance evaluations scheduled for 10/10/2024 and 25/12/2024, instead of rigid annual appraisals. How can we attract and retain top talent in this environment, moving past simply offering a "job"? Consider training programs like those at IIM Ahmedabad, starting 01/07/2024, focused on upskilling for gig workers.
